mapper.select: SELECT tbr.id, tbr.back_record_no, o.order_title, tbpd.back_periods, tbr.back_money, tbr.back_date, tbr.check_status FROM t_back_record tbr LEFT JOIN t_order o ON tbr.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_customer cus ON tbr.customer_id = cus.id LEFT JOIN t_back_plan_detail tbpd ON tbr.back_pland_id = tbpd.id AND tbr.back_id = tbpd.back_plan_id LEFT JOIN t_back_plan tbp ON tbr.back_id = tbp.id WHERE 1 = 1
